mapper.select: select A.department_no departmentNo, A.notice_no no, A.notice_title title, A.notice_view viewCount, B.department_name departmentName, A.notice_date noticeDate, A.notice_content content, A.notice_source source from NOTICES A, DEPARTMENTS B where A.department_no = B.department_no and A.notice_no = #{value}
mapper.update: update notices set notice_view = notice_view + 1 where notice_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into notices (notice_no, notice_title, employee_no, notice_content, notice_view, department_no, notice_date, notice_source) values (ERP_NOTICE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, null, #{content}, 0, #{deptNo}, sysdate, #{source})
